name: Angelbeat
overview: Having held well over 500 seminars since its founding in 1999, Angelbeat is the largest IT event company in North America based on its 56-city geographic coverage. Content is updated annually and focus on the related areas of security/compliance, virtualization/storage/infrastructure/data center and networking/wireless/voip. Each seminar brings together end user IT professionals with Microsoft, Cisco, VMware, NetApp, EMC, Intel, Google, IBM and other top firms. Presentation content is carefully monitored to focus on top IT issues, eliminate sales pitches and avoid redundant content, which provides attendees with maximum learning in a one-day session. Angelbeat also organizes breakfast workshops on a single subject - desktop/vista migration, physical/IT security convergence - and has established www.angelbeat.com as a destination site for IT professionals, with daily updates and on-line content to complement face-to-face seminars. Angelbeat has also produced events for organizations such as Microsoft and Intel, and created one-day end user workshops for Viacom, City of Houston and other leading employers.
